channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: PepsiCo sees growth in ‘away from home’ sales as more people are eating out
item.description: PepsiCo’s stock was having its best day in five years after earnings beat expectations in contrast to a profit miss in the previous quarter.

item.title: Some Americans are hoarding coffee, fearing that prices for their morning brew could go even higher
item.description: Weather conditions in coffee-producing countries have already boosted prices — and tariff threats could add to that.

item.title: This Tesla rival’s stock soars as Uber plans big investment, launch of robotaxi service
item.description: Lucid’s stock zooms to best day in months after Uber becomes the EV maker’s latest backer and the companies hatch a plan to launch robotaxis.

item.title: How do I ask my boyfriend to pay for half our birth-control costs? ‘I don’t want him to feel like I’m nickel and diming him.’

item.title: Google study shows LLMs abandon correct answers under pressure, threatening multi-turn AI systems
item.description: A DeepMind study finds LLMs are both stubborn and easily swayed. This confidence paradox has key implications for building AI applications.
